topic: Why AI Detectors Are Unreliable—and How Assessment Is Changing
target_audience: assessment leads, academic integrity officers, faculty

refs.content: Documents high false-positive burden even at 1%; recommends policy and assessment shifts rather than reliance on detectors.
Summarizes harms from false accusations, equity concerns, and bias against certain student groups.

refs.ref_string: Axios (2024) Teachers still can’t trust detectors
refs.content: Benchmarks show exaggerated accuracy claims; educators reconsider policies over detection tools.

special_instructions: Offer an assessment redesign menu: authentic tasks, oral defenses, process evidence, in-class creation; include sample rubrics and communication templates.
